title: RESET_VEHICLE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG
content:
0xDF62CFE2// ResetVehiclePedsCanStandOnTopFlag
void RESET_VEHICLE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle.Resets whether or not peds can stand on top of the specified vehicle.Note this flag is not replicated automatically, you will have to manually do so.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for RESET_VEHICLE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG
ResetVehiclePedsCanStandOnTopFlag(vehicle)
